name: Just Princess Things
description:
CONTROLS: WASD - Movement, E - Attach Light To Node, Left mouse click - Attack

BRIEF: Our Princess is sleepwalking again! And she is also blind! (What a DAMSEL!?!) Fret not though, Mighty and Bold Knight because you are assigned to save her! Collect light stones and activate rune nodes with them. This will light up the path for our Beautiful Princess and help her reach to safety! But beware, the forest is crawling with Derponic Bats! and they like ROCKS! (Especially runic rocks with symbols engraved on them).

Goodluck!
